resources.string: Go to MyAppointment and see the location and date of your vaccination.
See if you\'re eligible to take the COVID19 Vaccine and set up an appointment at your nearest provider.
Unfortunately, we couldn\'t schedule an appointment.
Due to your answers for the quesitons below, you are not eligible for taking the COVID-19 vaccine.
Sign In or Register to schedule an appointment.
Sign In or Register to schedule an appointment.
Below you can see information about your scheduled appointment. Be sure to bring your ID with you to your appointment
COVID-19 vaccines are safe and effective. After you’ve been fully vaccinated, you can start to do some things that you had to stop doing because of the pandemic.
COVID-19 vaccines are safe and effective.
You may have side effects after vaccination, but these are normal.

It typically takes two weeks after vaccination for the body to build protection (immunity) against the virus that causes COVID-19. You are not fully vaccinated until 2 weeks after the 2nd dose of a two-dose vaccine or two weeks after a one-dose vaccine.
Use this app so you can easily schedule an appointment and help us lower the spread of COVID-19
You do not have an appointment yet.
You are under the age of 18
Are you a citizen of Bosnia & Herzegovina?
Did you have COVID-19 in the last 6 months?

Individuals may wish to defer their own COVID-19 vaccination for up to 6 months from the time of SARS-CoV-2 infection. As more data becomes available on duration of immunity after infection, this time period may be adjusted.
Do you have a history of severe allergic reaction to any component of the vaccine?
To view the components of the vaccine visit who.int/vaccines

Pregnant women are at higher risk of severe COVID-19 than non-pregnant women, and COVID-19 has been associated with an increased risk of pre-term birth. However due to insufficient data, WHO does not recommend the vaccination of pregnant women at this time.
Do you have any of the listed medical conditions?
This includes hypertension, diabetes, asthma, pulmonary, liver or kidney disease, as well as chronic infections that are stable and controlled.
Are you working in a medical field?
Do you have any chronic ilnesses?
Such as Cancer, Chronic Lung Diseases, Dementia or other neurological conditions, HIV, Heart Conditions, etc.
Do you work or reside in Elderly Care?
Choose a vaccine you would like to be vaccinated with.
Location: Alipašina bb, Sarajevo 71000 (Juan Antonio Samaranch Olympic Hall)
You do not have an appointment yet.
